column1: 0521|twenty-one minutes past five o'clock in the morning|On the morning of the ninth instant
column4: at twenty-one minutes past five o'clock in the morning
column5: P.C. Whitstable was proceeding upon his usual beat and had reached the corner of Clarges Street and Piccadilly
column6: when he heard a shout on the other side of the road
column7: at the point where a path exits from The Green Park.
